Text.Page:
I hear you're thinking about entering that cave. You are? Wonderful! For you, I mean. I mean I hear it's...great, but I wouldn't be excited for me that you're going in. That'd be dumb.

Although...

Well, as long as you're going in, it would be pretty neat if you could grab a few cave mushroom spores. Just if you happen to see them, of course.

And then, maybe you could, I don't know, deliver them to Ruanal?

Cave mushrooms? How wonderful. I'm starving!

Did Nadr send these? What a guy. He's been looking out for me since we were green.
